name: bigscreen-player
description: Simplified media playback for bigscreen devices.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run jasmine
scripts.lint:code:changed: git diff-index --name-only HEAD | egrep '.js$' | xargs eslint
scripts.build:example-app: cd docs/example-app/ && npm install && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.pre-release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag --no-git-commit && npm run build:version
scripts.pre-release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag --no-git-commit && npm run build:version
scripts.pre-release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag --no-git-commit && npm run build:version

author: BBC
